subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, Lee Westwood and Adam Scott all had chances to dust the tournament with celebrity sparkle during the third round, but every one of them eventually ceded the stage to the lesser-knowns.
snippet: Phil Mickelson, Lee Westwood and Adam Scott all had chances to dust the tournament with celebrity sparkle during the third round, but every one of them eventually ceded the stage to the lesser-knowns.
